pages.text: A lesser $(l:bewitchment:rituals/rituals)Ritual$() that calls on water spirits to make it rain.$(br2)The rain itself is supernatural, with a rough time span of up to half a day - that is assuming the $(l:bewitchment:rituals/rituals)Ritual$() is not $(l:bewitchment:creatures/cat)Reinforced$() somehow.
